full_description:
Razer Kishi V2 Mobile Gaming Controller for iPhone (Global)

The Razer Kishi V2 for iPhone Mobile Gaming Controller enjoys a higher degree of precision and customization that surpasses the capabilities of touchscreen controls thanks to engineering that meets the requirements of competing console controllers. Use the controller to play the largest PC and console releases straight on your phone, in addition to the newest mobile games. Enjoy the freedom to play from the cloud or beam it from your PC or console thanks to support for popular game streaming apps (third-party hardware and services may be required). With its sturdy, extended bridge, the Razer Kishi V2 securely fits all contemporary smartphone models, ensuring that it stays in place as you play games. Just connect your iPhone's charging cable to the controller to keep it charged while you play. With every button strategically placed for comfort and portability, the Razer Kishi V2 is made for extended gaming sessions and is thin enough to go into a pocket. Combine all of your mobile gaming into one free software to enjoy seamless game discovery across dozens of games, advanced controller customization, an integrated game launcher, and much more. With the Razer Kishi V2 for iPhone, a global mobile gaming controller that gives your phone a console-like gameplay experience, you'll have to reevaluate everything you know about gaming while on the road. Play what you want, when you want, and anywhere you want with this platform, which is optimized for native mobile games, cloud gaming, and remote PC or console play.

full_description:
Razer Kishi V2 Universal Gaming Controller for Android (Global)

The Razer Kishi V2 is a global mobile gaming controller that provides console-quality gameplay to your smartphone. Play the finest AAA games on your mobile phone precisely as you would on a gaming console, with no compromises. Reconsider everything you thought you understood about mobile gaming. With cutting-edge microswitch buttons, analog triggers, and customizable macros, the Razer Kishi V2 is meant to meet the standards of competitive console controllers. The Razer Kishi V2 has a sturdy, extensible bridge that properly fits the most popular Android devices, ensuring a snug fit that won't come loose when gaming. Kishi allows you to play entire PC and console games straight on your phone, with compatibility with the most popular game streaming programs. Play from your device or the cloud. Kishi V2 decreases input latency, providing for responsive, fluid control, and has passthrough charging, letting you charge your phone while playing. The Razer Kishi V2 is tailored for both comfort and portability, with each button in precisely the perfect spot, and is designed for lengthy gaming sessions while being thin enough to pack into a pocket. With the press of a dedicated button, you can browse hundreds of compatible games, record and share gameplay, and keep your Kishi V2 updated with integrated software that provides full customizability.

full_description:
Razer Raiju Ultimate PS4 Controller with Bluetooth and Wired Connection (Global)

Razer Raiju Ultimate PS4 Controller features both Bluetooth and wired connection. Enjoy total freedom gaming wirelessly whether at home or at your best matesâ€™, and simply switch to wired gameplay during a tournament for that extra assurance. With interchangeable thumbstick heights and shapes, and the choice between a tilting or individual D-Pad layout, customize the Razer Raiju Ultimate for optimal comfort and gameplay. A quick control panel also provides instant access to important functions, while a secure button lock lets you avoid unintended keypresses. It has 4 multi-function buttons and 4 Razer Mecha-Tactile Action Buttons. It comes with a 3.5 mm audio port for stereo audio output and microphone input (Audio function only available in USB mode). It can serve up to 11 hrs battery life on a single charge. It has no warranty.
